thread.title: Hockey world shocked by fatal junior team crash in Canada

title: Hockey world shocked by fatal junior team crash in Canada
text:
Hockey world shocked by fatal junior team crash in Canada 2:08am EDT - 01:25 
At least 14 people were killed when a bus carrying a Canadian junior hockey team, the Humboldt Broncos, collided with a truck in the province of Saskatchewan Friday evening. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
At least 14 people were killed when a bus carrying a Canadian junior hockey team, the Humboldt Broncos, collided with a truck in the province of Saskatchewan Friday evening. Colette Luke has more.
